title: Koukokugaisha, Danshiryou no Okazu-kun
original_name: 広告会社、男子寮のおかずくん
sinopse:
Kazu, Keisuke, Ippei and Tadashi all work at the same advertising company and stay at the same company dormitory. They struggle to deal with their customers, but they like working in advertising. Their only outlet to relieve their stress is to have dinner together on Fridays.

(Source: AsianWiki)
